title: Service Fabric .NET SDK Repositories
body: Service Fabric .NET SDK repositories (Azure/service-fabric-services-and-actors-dotnet, Microsoft/service-fabric-aspnetcore) provide .NET development libraries for Service Fabric. Contains reliable services patterns, actor model implementations, ASP.NET Core integration, dependency injection patterns, and communication protocols for building Service Fabric applications in .NET.
